ca.projectTOMi.tomi.service

Class ReportService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.projectTOMi.tomi.service.ReportService

  • @Service
public class ReportService
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides services generating reports.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Karol Talbot
